price: (59) They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers."
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
